title: Abc of Universal Basic Income - Universal basic income: Modi govt's poverty killer? | The Economic Times
text: Abc of Universal Basic Income Jan 31, 2017, 05.01 PM IST Universal Basic Income Scheme is an alternative to plethora of state subsidies for poverty alleviation, Economy Survey said.
